com.bitpay.sdk.model.invoice

Class InvoiceBuyerProvidedInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bitpay.sdk.model.invoice.InvoiceBuyerProvidedInfo

  • public class InvoiceBuyerProvidedInfo
extends Object
    Information collected from the buyer during the process of paying an invoice. Initially this object is empty.
    See Also:
    REST API Invoices

    • Method Detail

      • getName

        public String getName()
        Gets name. Populated with the buyer's name address if passed in the buyer object by the merchant.
        Returns:
        the name

      • setName

        public void setName(String name)
        Sets name. Populated with the buyer's name address if passed in the buyer object by the merchant.
        Parameters:
        name - the name

      • getPhoneNumber

        public String getPhoneNumber()
        Gets phone number. Populated with the buyer's phone number if passed in the buyer object by the merchant.
        Returns:
        the phone number

      • setPhoneNumber

        public void setPhoneNumber(String phoneNumber)
        Sets phone number. Populated with the buyer's phone number if passed in the buyer object by the merchant.
        Parameters:
        phoneNumber - the phone number

      • getSelectedTransactionCurrency

        public String getSelectedTransactionCurrency()
        Gets selected transaction currency. This field will be populated with the cryptocurrency selected to pay the BitPay invoice, current supported values are "BTC", "BCH", "ETH", "GUSD", "PAX", "BUSD", "USDC", "XRP", "DOGE", "DAI" and "WBTC". If not yet selected, this field will not be returned.
        Returns:
        the selected transaction currency

      • setSelectedTransactionCurrency

        public void setSelectedTransactionCurrency(String selectedTransactionCurrency)
        Sets selected transaction currency. This field will be populated with the cryptocurrency selected to pay the BitPay invoice, current supported values are "BTC", "BCH", "ETH", "GUSD", "PAX", "BUSD", "USDC", "XRP", "DOGE", "DAI" and "WBTC". If not yet selected, this field will not be returned.
        Parameters:
        selectedTransactionCurrency - the selected transaction currency

      • getEmailAddress

        public String getEmailAddress()
        Gets email address. Populated with the buyer's email address if passed in the buyer object, otherwise this field is not returned in the response.
        Returns:
        the email address

      • setEmailAddress

        public void setEmailAddress(String emailAddress)
        Sets email address. Populated with the buyer's email address if passed in the buyer object, otherwise this field is not returned in the response.
        Parameters:
        emailAddress - the email address

      • getSelectedWallet

        public String getSelectedWallet()
        Gets selected wallet. This field contains the name of the cryptocurrency wallet selected by the shopper to complete the payment.
        Returns:
        the selected wallet

      • setSelectedWallet

        public void setSelectedWallet(String selectedWallet)
        Sets selected wallet. This field contains the name of the cryptocurrency wallet selected by the shopper to complete the payment.
        Parameters:
        selectedWallet - the selected wallet

      • getSms

        public String getSms()
        Gets SMS provided by user for communications. This is only used for instances where a buyers email (primary form of buyer communication) is can not be gathered.
        Returns:
        the sms

      • setSms

        public void setSms(String sms)
        Sets SMS provided by user for communications. This is only used for instances where a buyers email (primary form of buyer communication) is can not be gathered.
        Parameters:
        sms - the sms

      • getSmsVerified

        public Boolean getSmsVerified()
        Gets verification status of SMS (ie. have they passed the challenge).
        Returns:
        the sms verified

      • setSmsVerified

        public void setSmsVerified(Boolean smsVerified)
        Sets verification status of SMS (ie. have they passed the challenge).
        Parameters:
        smsVerified - the sms verified
